title: geneesmiddelen
cleaned_text: 1.5 tonnes of illegal medicines ](/en/news/customs_and_the_famhp_seize_15_tonnes_of_illegal_medicines) On 14 July 2023, customs and the FAMHP seized 1.5 tonnes of illegal medicines at Brucargo. This is one of the largest seizures in the European Union in recent years.
